options.content:
# Notes
- IPFS server with content is in Ljubljana
- concerning secondary downloads only bee-3.dev server has some extra caching. (65.108.101.3
65.108.104.135). The rest is just bee.
- IPFS servers used are: "ipfs.io", "w3s.link", "ipfs.eth.aragon.network", "nftstorage.link", "cloudflare-ipfs.com"
- Attempts can be ignored. Time is measured from first attempt to successfull download. (its set to Max 15 in the script)
- size is in kilobytes values in seconds
- source https://github.com/darkobas2/util_web3_storageperf

panels.description:
Time it takes from when data was uploaded to when it was first downloaded. ie. distribution time
y - number of concluded tests
x - time those tests were concluded in
panels.title: Distribution IPFS

panels.description:
Time it takes from when data was uploaded to when it was first downloaded. ie. distribution time
y - number of concluded tests
x - time those tests were concluded in
panels.title: Distribution SWARM

panels.description:
compare mean times
y axis is time in seconds
x axis is grouped by tested data in kilobytes and storage
panels.title: Mean time/size
